parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: 0-based index of the item to replace in the flyout

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the item to add to the flyout

parameters.name: HintString
parameters.description: Text displayed in the SOLIDWORKS Design status bar when the pointer is on the item

parameters.name: ImageListIndex
parameters.description: Index of the image in the icon list assigned to the parent flyout (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Function to call when this item is selected

parameters.name: UpdateCallbackFunction
parameters.description: Optional function that controls the state of the item; if specified, then SOLIDWORKS Design calls this function before displaying the item If your method returns... Then SOLIDWORKS Design... 0 Deselects and disables the item 1 Deselects and enables the item; this is the default state if no update function is specified 2 Selects and disables the item 3 Selects and enables the item 4 Hides the item

title: IFlyoutGroup.ReplaceCommandItem
description: Replaces a command item at the specified position.
signature:
System.Int32 ReplaceCommandItem( 
   System.Int32
Position
,
   System.String
Name
,
   System.String
HintString
,
   System.Int32
ImageListIndex
,
   System.String
CallbackFunction
,
   System.String
UpdateCallbackFunction
)

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: 0-based index of the item to replace in the flyout

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the item to add to the flyout

parameters.name: HintString
parameters.description: Text displayed in the SOLIDWORKS Design status bar when the pointer is on the item

parameters.name: ImageListIndex
parameters.description: Index of the image in the icon list assigned to the parent flyout (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CallbackFunction
parameters.description: Function to call when this item is selected

parameters.name: UpdateCallbackFunction
parameters.description: Optional function that controls the state of the item; if specified, then SOLIDWORKS Design calls this function before displaying the item If your method returns... Then SOLIDWORKS Design... 0 Deselects and disables the item 1 Deselects and enables the item; this is the default state if no update function is specified 2 Selects and disables the item 3 Selects and enables the item 4 Hides the item

remarks:
ImageListIndex is 0-based. The size of the index is equal to the number of images in the large or small graphic file for that flyout. See
IFlyoutGroup::LargeIconList
and
IFlyoutGroup::SmallIconList
for details.
You can use -1 for ImageListIndex to specify that no icon is needed.
